statements: SELECT * FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek'
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE wheel_size > 26 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, model_name, brand, type FROM bicycle_models ORDER BY model_name ASC
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models WHERE frame_material = 'Carbon' AND type = 'Road'
SELECT brand, model_name, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE wheel_size = 29 AND price > 1000
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models WHERE wheel_size > 26 AND type = 'Mountain'
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM bicycle_models GROUP BY brand ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT id, model_name, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY brand, price
SELECT model_name, wheel_size, frame_material FROM bicycle_models WHERE wheel_size >= 26 AND frame_material IN ('Aluminum', 'Carbon')
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models;
SELECT model_name, brand FROM bicycle_models ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT brand, year FROM bicycle_models WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek' AND year < 2015;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM bicycle_models INNER JOIN bicycle_prices ON bicycle_models.id = bicycle_prices.model_id WHERE brand = 'Giant' AND price > 1000;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Specialized' AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT brand, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM bicycle_models INNER JOIN bicycle_prices ON bicycle_models.id = bicycle_prices.model_id GROUP BY brand;
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM bicycle_models LEFT JOIN bicycle_prices ON bicycle_models.id = bicycle_prices.model_id WHERE price IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM bicycle_models ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT model_name, wheel_size, frame_material FROM bicycle_models INNER JOIN model_specs ON bicycle_models.model_id = model_specs.model_id;
SELECT model_name, reviewer_name, rating FROM bicycle_models JOIN model_reviews ON bicycle_models.model_id = model_reviews.model_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM bicycle_models ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model_name, color, price FROM bicycle_models bm JOIN model_specs ms ON bm.model_id = ms.model_id WHERE ms.wheel_size > 26;
SELECT model_name, brand, rating FROM bicycle_models bm JOIN model_reviews mr ON bm.model_id = mr.model_id WHERE mr.rating >= 4;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek' AND price < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek'
SELECT model_name, year FROM bicycle_models ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE price <= 500
SELECT * FROM bike_specifications WHERE wheel_size >= 26 ORDER BY wheel_size ASC
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM bike_reviews
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY brand ASC, price DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Trek' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM bicycle_models JOIN bike_sales ON bicycle_models.id = bike_sales.model_id WHERE sale_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM bike_reviews WHERE LENGTH(review_text) > 100;
SELECT model_name, brand, frame_material, wheel_size, color FROM bicycle_models JOIN bike_specifications ON bicycle_models.id = bike_specifications.model_id WHERE wheel_size >= 26 AND color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM BicycleModels;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM BicycleModels WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM BicycleModels ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM BicycleModels WHERE brand = 'Trek';
SELECT model_name, brand, year, price FROM BicycleModels WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM BicycleModels;
SELECT model_name, brand, year FROM BicycleModels WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM BicycleModels ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, color FROM BicycleModels JOIN Specifications ON BicycleModels.model_id = Specifications.model_id WHERE color = 'Red';

SELECT BicycleModels.model_name, Manufactures.manufacturer_name FROM BicycleModels JOIN ModelManufacturers ON BicycleModels.model_id = ModelManufacturers.model_id JOIN Manufactures ON ModelManufacturers.manufacturer_id = Manufactures.manufacturer_id;
